Name: Nelu's Adventure
About the game: Nelu's Adventure is a 2D pixel art story-based platformer where you can enjoy mild violence against pixel penguins. Meet Nelu's friends as you progress through this adventure, they will try to provide some help along the way, while you struggle to understand how you ended up inside an abandoned biodome. Dodge bullets, stun your enemies and eliminate them using your AK while hoping that one day, you will manage take revenge on the penguin that started this all... Pengualim This is the (pretty short) adventure of Nelu and his friends, that everyone (who bought the sticker in CSGO and nobody else probably) was waiting for. Move your fluffy pixelated cheeks around in order to escape Pengualim's army and not die of atherosclerosis in this amazingly mediocre 2D world.
